title: Want to Heat Train like Pogačar? CORE Releases Sleeker, Smarter Thermal Sensor for Sweaty Performance Gains
content:
Heat training is up there with high-carb fueling and topical cooling as a must-have of elite performance. CORE's new sensor makes it easier and more comfortable for amateurs to do it, too.

Read the full article at Want to Heat Train like Pogačar? CORE Releases Sleeker, Smarter Thermal Sensor for Sweaty Performance Gains on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
